item.title: About
item.description: Definition: miette [/mjÉ›t/] nom fÃ©minin A crumb, fragment or small amount. French in origin. Hi there! Just two eggs building a tiny house out of second hand and refurbished materials. Follow our journey here :)

item.title: Hi I'm Miette
item.description: Hello World ðŸ‘‹ My name is Lys and my partner Erny and I are building a tiny home made out of seconds, reclaimed and recycled materials. This is a small space on the interwebs to to document our progress and share our photos for anyone who would like to follow our journey! ðŸ˜„ Why build a tiny house? Erny and I have always been interested in living more sustainably and living small.
